targets.query:
from(bucket: "Master")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WeConnect")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["WeJson"] == "weconnect/rawjson")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vehicles_WV1ZZZSYZM9019663_domains_parking_parkingPosition_latitude" or r["_field"] == "vehicles_WV1ZZZSYZM9019663_domains_parking_parkingPosition_longitude")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "host", "WeJson"])
  |> rename(columns: {vehicles_WV1ZZZSYZM9019663_domains_parking_parkingPosition_latitude: "lat", vehicles_WV1ZZZSYZM9019663_domains_parking_parkingPosition_longitude: "lon"})

from(bucket: "Master")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WeConnect")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["WeJson"] == "weconnect/rawjson")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vehicles_WV1ZZZSYZM9019663_domains_access_accessStatus_overallStatus")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "Master")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WeConnect")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["WeJson"] == "weconnect/rawjson")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vehicles_WV1ZZZSYZM9019663_domains_access_accessStatus_doorLockStatus")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "Master")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["WeJson"] == "weconnect/rawjson")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vehicles_WV1ZZZSYZM9019663_domains_measurements_rangeStatus_adBlueRange")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "Master")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WeConnect")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["WeJson"] == "weconnect/rawjson")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vehicles_WV1ZZZSYZM9019663_domains_vehicleLights_lightsStatus_lights_left_status" or r["_field"] == "vehicles_WV1ZZZSYZM9019663_domains_vehicleLights_lightsStatus_lights_right_status")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "Master")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WeConnect")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["WeJson"] == "weconnect/rawjson")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vehicles_WV1ZZZSYZM9019663_domains_measurements_fuelLevelStatus_currentFuelLevel_pct")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
